Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent;
local vChar = Tool.Parent local torso = nil local RightShoulder = nil while vChar == nil or vChar.Name == "BackPack" or torso == nil or RightShoulder == nil do vChar = Tool.Parent if vChar ~= nil and vChar.Name ~= "BackPack" then torso = vChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then RightShoulder = torso:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") end end wait(1) end
Tool.Enabled = true
--local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") local sparkColors = {Color3.new(1, 0, 0), Color3.new(0,1,0), Color3.new(0,0,1), Color3.new(1,1,0), Color3.new(1,0,1), Color3.new(0,1,1)}
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
gunDown()
--local missile = Instance.new("Part") local missile = Tool.Handle:Clone() Tool.Handle.Transparency = 1
--littleSpark = spark:Clone() --littleSpark.Parent = missile --littleSpark.Color = sparkColors[math.random(1,#sparkColors)] --littleSpark.Color = Color3.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random())
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*5 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 5
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
--[[print("dPos: ") print(dPos)
print("deltaY: ") print(deltaY)
print("deltaXZ: ") print(deltaXZ)]]--
-- pick a random high angle for each shot (60-80 degrees) alpha = math.random()*math.pi/8 + math.pi/3 --alpha = math.pi / 4
missile.Position = spawnPos --missile.Size = Vector3.new(math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01,math.random()*0.01) missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20)
-- back-solve for the velocity required to hit the target point --gravity = 196.1643 gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
--print("numerator: ") --print(numerator) --print("denominator: ") --print(denominator)
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 300 then missileSpeed = 300 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) --[[print("missileSpeed: ") print(missileSpeed) print("vY: ") print(vY) print("vX: ") print(vX) print("vZ: ") print(vZ)]]--
--missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random() --missile.Shape = math.random(0,2)
-- missile.BottomSurface = 0 -- missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.Name = "Spark" --missile.Reflectance = 1 --missile.Transparency = 0 missile.CanCollide = true
--local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") --force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*200,0) --force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = .6 confettiBang:Play() end end
function gunUp() --RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 --RightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 2*3.14 end
function gunDown() RightShoulder.MaxVelocity = 0.5 RightShoulder.DesiredAngle = 3.14 end
function onEquip() gunUp() --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) --Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, -1) --Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -.75, 1.5) end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
local reload = 4 --if (isTurbo(character)) then -- reload = .25 -- print("turbo") --end
--gunUp() --for i = 1,25 do local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint --local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position) local lookAt = targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position --if (lookAt.magnitude > 1000) then lookAt = lookAt.unit * 1000 end fire(lookAt) wait(.1) --end --gunDown() wait(reload) gunUp()
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Handle.Transparency = 0
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquip) script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

ball = script.Parent damage = 25
HitSound = Instance.new("Sound") HitSound.Name = "HitSound" HitSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11945266" HitSound.Parent = ball HitSound.Volume = 1
debris = game:GetService("Debris") debris:addItem(ball, 15)
local bpTable = {} local startRadTable = {} local startGrenPosTable = {}
local connection = nil local blueFire = Instance.new("Fire") local orangeFire = Instance.new("Fire")
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then HitSound:Play() local torso = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then local spinForce = torso:FindFirstChild("TornadeSpin") if spinForce == nil then humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) local spinForce = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") spinForce.P = 1000000 spinForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0,50,0) spinForce.maxTorque = Vector3.new(spinForce.P,spinForce.P,spinForce.P) spinForce.Name = "TornadeSpin" spinForce.Parent = torso debris:AddItem(spinForce, 4) end
local newBV = torso:FindFirstChild("TornadeLift") if newBV == nil then newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.Name = "TornadeLift" newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, newBV.P, 0) newBV.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 16, 0) newBV.Parent = torso debris:AddItem(newBV, 4) end
local newBP = torso:FindFirstChild("TornadePos") if newBP == nil then newBP = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBP.Name = "TornadePos" newBP.P = 100000 newBP.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBP.P, 0, newBP.P) newBP.position = torso.Position newBP.Parent = torso table.insert(bpTable, newBP) table.insert(startRadTable, (torso.Position - ball.Position)*Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) table.insert(startGrenPosTable, ball.Position) blueFire.Parent = ball -- fire only appears if someone was hit :) orangeFire.Parent = ball debris:AddItem(newBP, 4) end end end
end
--while (ball.Velocity * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)).magnitude > 8 or (ball.Velocity * Vector3.new(0,1,0)).magnitude > 1 do wait() end
wait(3) -- and the number of the counting shall be three
ball.CFrame = CFrame.new(ball.Position) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 1)
blueFire.Name = "BlueFire" blueFire.Heat = 50 blueFire.Size = 10 blueFire.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 1) blueFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
orangeFire.Name = "OrangeFire" orangeFire.Heat = -50 orangeFire.Size = 10 orangeFire.Color = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) orangeFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
--blueFire.Parent = ball
debris:AddItem(blueFire, 4) debris:AddItem(orangeFire, 4)
local xPlosion = Instance.new("Explosion") xPlosion.Name = "TornadeOw" xPlosion.BlastRadius = 7 xPlosion.BlastPressure = 0 xPlosion.Position = ball.Position xPlosion.Parent = game.Workspace
connection = xPlosion.Hit:connect(onTouched)
-- remove grenade practically (it will be actually removed by debris service once wind forces are finished) ball.Transparency = 1 local newBallFloat = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBallFloat.P = 100000 newBallFloat.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBallFloat.P, newBallFloat.P, newBallFloat.P) newBallFloat.position = ball.Position newBallFloat.Name = "FireFloat" newBallFloat.Parent = ball
ball.CanCollide = false ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) ball.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
while true do ball.CFrame = (CFrame.Angles(0, 0.7, 0)*(ball.CFrame-ball.Position)) + ball.Position for i = 1, #bpTable do bpTable[i].position = startGrenPosTable[i] + startRadTable[i] startRadTable[i] = CFrame.Angles(0, .7, 0)*startRadTable[i] end wait(.1) end

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
